snippet.title: Helheim Hassle - Announcement Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
Wishlist Helheim Hassle - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1095120/Helheim_Hassle/

Helheim Hassle is a narrative adventure game that is as much about friendship as it is about body parts. 

Dive deeper into the Perfectly Paranormal universe and witness yet another unlikely friendship, on an adventure that takes place the same Tuesday as Manual Samuel!

Helheim Hassle is a narrative adventure game with puzzle platforming elements. Play as Bjørn, a pacifist Viking that can detach and combine limbs at will to solve challenging puzzles and get out of uncomfortable situations involving desperate Norse Gods, Goblins, Dragons, and angry skeletons.

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/PerfectlyParano
Follow “Is Helheim Hassle Finished?” to learn if Helheim Hassle is finished: https://twitter.com/HassleIs
Join our discord: https://discord.gg/nHaJ6dC
Sign up to our super-secret newsletter to receive info about updates deals and other e-mail that will generally make your life better!:  https://perfectlyparanormal.us4.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=54a567eea64c653d9aa49d6b4&id=48e8e5b5ba
